name: Electry-City
description:
Controls:

  • Middle mouse button: hold & drag to pan the camera
  • R: completely reset your progress

WIKI:

Houses generate randomly on the map and make you money if connected to the electric grid. Be careful, they might get angry if you leave them without power for long and you'll have to start paying a penalty! If steady power supply is kept up, houses will eventually turn into skyscrapers.
